wantToLeave: Do you really want to leave this page?

formErrors.name: Enter your name
formErrors.correctPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

description.cardPayment: After placing the order, we will contact you to clarify all the details, and send the card number to any of the proposed messengers (Viber, Telegram, WhatsApp, Messenger) to pay for the order.
description.cashPayment: Cash payment is available only to residents of Zaporizhzhia upon delivery by courier.
description.cashOnDelivery: On a small prepayment on the card in the amount of the cost in both directions. The cost is determined by the tariffs of the NovaPoshta logistics company. Payment on delivery is available for orders over 500₴.

zpDeliveryInfo: Free delivery in Kommunarsky and Aleksandrovsky districts in the amount of 300 ₴ or more. Other areas by agreement after ordering.
otherCityDelivery: For delivery to other cities of Ukraine, we use the delivery service "NovaPoshta" (НоваПошта). Delivery is carried out within 1-3 days, depending on your region. Shipping cost according to
orderDescription: Your order will be reviewed as soon as possible, you will be contacted to confirm it. We have also sent a copy of the order to your email address. For all questions write to Viber +380995238607

rule.readAndAgree: I have read and agree with
